item.title: I Actually Like Slack
item.description: As a software engineer, you really need your focus time. Unfortunately, distractions are everywhere! It might be snowing outside, or you might be wondering if now is the perfect time to get a coffee. Then it happensâ€”someone has used Slack’s @channel tag to completely interrupt everybody else, including you. This scenario may sound familiar to you. The reason is that Slack has given the nuclear codes to everyone in the company, allowing them to destroy productivity with one single command.
